about_the_game:
The lost city of EL DORADO has been found. You've been sent by the British Museum with the mission to recover the lost treasures that have been there for centuries... But no one knew the city was habited. The chance to return with riches and fame are in your hands.

Will you face the challenge?


Gameplay Description:

Tomb Stalkers is an Action Arcade Puzzle game like few with fast paced game mechanics. Walk around the tombs to open them and reveal their content, you require to get a key and a relic to be able to unlock the exit to the next level. But beware, the sorceress (living, undead and even gods) minions are upon you with their unique and annoying abilities. Even her will join to the chase if is provoked enough! Each scenario contains secrets and traps to be aware of in your search of riches and fame.

Enemies:

  • The mummies: raised by the Sorceress magic, these wretched creatures has the mission to catch you or getting in your way.
  • White Mummies are not the brightest of all, just try to not to get in their way.
  • Red Mummies in the other hand are vicious predators and will go directly after you, no matter if you're hidden.
  • Green Mummies wanders around and left bandages whenever they goes, try not to trip with those.
  • Blue Mummies erases the player's track, making difficult to open tombs.
  • Pink Mummies patrols the area in search of someone to love, and they run preety fast when goes after her prey.
  • The Guardian: Loyal to the Sorceress, these armed giants protects the exit to new areas. Their spears have very large range and they are very accurate throwing them to unwanted "visitors".
  • The Sorceress: our lovely nemesis, better not get caught by her or you will start the current level from the beginning.
  • Quetzalcoatl: The Sorceress last hidden card to stop you: a giant winged godlike monster which will invoke lightning storms and chasing tornados after you. Is there a way to stop it?

Demo Features:

  • 2 Player Co-op game
  • Coin-Op/Arcade mode avaiable.
  • play the first 6 levels of the full game.
  • Control compatible with Keyboard and Gamepad.
